articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets British Queen
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets British Queen
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to British Queen Elizabeth II on June 1 on the occasion of her official birthday, the national holiday of the UK.
					 Extending congratulations to the queen, the message wished the British people prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 4 sent a message of greeting to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, on the occasion of his 71st birthday.
					 The message sincerely wished that the Equatorial Guinean president would always be healthy and happy and continue to register success in his noble work for the country and the people
					
					 It expressed the belief that the good bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would as ever grow in the common interests of the two peoples and in line with their desires.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Delegates to 7th Congress of KCU
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Delegates to 7th Congress of KCU
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- On Saturday, there took place a birthday party for delegates to the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) at Chongryu Restaurant.
					 Present there were officials concerned and the delegates marking their birthdays.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un showed such warm loving care as making sure that a birthday party is given for delegates, adding that it is the reflection of the profound and noble intention of Kim Jong Un to make the laughter and songs of happiness of the children are always heard.
					
					 Jon called on the delegates to fully prepare themselves as able revolutionary persons knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, and pillars of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's prospering Korea, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The attendants pledged to prepare themselves as true juvenile revolutionaries and children's guards of the Workers' Party of Korea by studying hard and successfully leading an organizational life, holding aloft the slogan "Let us be always ready for the dear respected General Kim Jong Un!"

articles.title: Delegates to KCU Visit Various Parts of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegates to KCU Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The delegates to the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) are spending pleasant days, touring various parts of Pyongyang.
					 They went to the Rungna Dolphinarium.
					
					 Being briefed on the Dolphinarium built in a peculiar way on Rungna Islet, they went round the underground hall and underwater cavern where coral reefs, fishes, large octopus, etc., look like those alive. They were pleased to see skills of dolphins' group jumping, ring turning, jumping to the surface of water and shaking hands with visitors.
					
					 They spent pleasant times at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					 They also visited the Central Zoo.
					
					 Learning that the zoo successfully turned into a center for cultural and emotional life of people and school youth and children, they watched rare animals from different countries and regions of the world.
					
					 They appreciated art and acrobatic performances given at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the National Circus. They enjoyed skating at the People's Open-air Ice Rink and Skate Park.
					
					 They visited the National House of Class Education.
					
					 Through the visit, they keenly realized the true colors of the imperialists and class enemies as the aggressors and murderers.

articles.title: KCU Boasts of Brilliant Tradition
articles.content:
KCU Boasts of Brilliant Tradition
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean Children's Union (KCU) that originated from the Children's Corps organized in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle boasts of brilliant tradition in each stage of the Korean revolution.
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Kim Ki Song was shot to death by the Japanese "punitive" forces while he was diverting their pursuit elsewhere with trumpet in order to save the inhabitants of a guerrilla base from their attack.
					
					 A 9-year-old girl, Kim Kum Sun, died a heroic death, shouting "Long live the Korean revolution!", undaunted by harsh torture.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), a number of KCU members bravely fought against the U.S. invaders with arms in hands. Among them were So Kang Ryom, Rim Hyong Sam and the members of the children's guard of the Anju Coal Mine.
					
					 In the 1970s, Ri Chang Do, who was a subbranch chairman of the Sinmyong Secondary School Committee of the KCU, sacrificed his life to quenching a forest fire with his classmates.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the Title of DPRK Hero was awarded to him for his patriotic deed.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, on his way to military units in June Juche 85 (1996), caught a sight of wild flowers laid before a monument to Kim Il Sung's field guidance.
					
					 Learning that the flowers were laid by a schoolgirl called Kim Myong Hui, he took a measure to make her known throughout the country in high appreciation of her pure-minded deed.
					
					 Millions of KCU members, who greeted the 67th KCU anniversary, are now filled with determination to be intensely loyal to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Facelifted
articles.content:
Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Facelifted
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory has been facelifted to meet the requirement of the era of the Workers' Party.
					 The factory buildings are redolent of rest homes.
					
					 Asphalt roads run through the precinct, which are forested with such species of trees as zelkova, white birch and fir, well harmonized with resting sites.
					
					 The nursery of the factory was rebuilt on a modern basis. It has playing apparatuses, swimming pool, sun room, kitchen, dining room, intelligence games room, breastfeeding room, education room, etc. 
					
					 The factory is fully equipped with welfare and service facilities including a public bath, barber's, beauty parlor, swimming pool and music room.
					
					 When visiting the factory, the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un said that the factory reminds one of a palace, the one meeting requirement of the era of the Workers' Party and the one pervaded with patriotism, underscoring the need for all the units to follow the example of the factory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating "Masikryong Speed"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating "Masikryong Speed"
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Create the 'Masikryong Speed' and Usher in New Heyday on All Fronts for Socialist Construction"
					 This historic appeal reflects the warm love of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for the people, his resolve to race against the century so that the people can enjoy wealth and comfort under the socialist system as soon as possible, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial on Saturday.
					
					 It says:
					
					 It is also the declaration of the absolute trust in the People's Army, the main force of the Songun revolution, and highly important guidelines for bringing about a great surge and innovations on all fronts for socialist construction in the new a-match-for-a hundred offensive speed in the 21st century.
					
					 Bring everything to earlier completion, not let us follow the time but race against it to make the people enjoy all happiness. This is the spirit of the love for the people that runs through the appeal.
					
					 It is the firm will of the DPRK's army and people to win a final victory in the all-out action with the U.S. and the construction of a thriving socialist nation through the offensive of decisively countering the hardships under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 The Masikryong Speed to be created by the army and the people of the country in hearty response to his patriotic appeal is the speed of the new era of the Songun revolution when the people dash forward to achieve a final victory true to the line of the WPK on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 This speed is the great advance speed just suited to the revolutionary spirit, pluck and creative disposition of the WPK and the Korean people who are bringing earlier a final victory, taking the initiatives in the all-out action with the U.S. and the construction of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It is a shining tradition and fighting spirit of the army and the people of the DPRK that when the leader knocks the wall, they shake the whole country and when the party is determined to do something, they carry it out without fail.

articles.title: Peaceful Environment Is Essential on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Peaceful Environment Is Essential on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. has true intent to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, it has to drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and cancel all plans for military exercises, urges Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 Conditions for lasting peace have not yet been provided on the Korean Peninsula, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Unless there is a change in the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the possibility of the outbreak of a war will constantly remain on the peninsula. Moreover, the U.S., which worked out a military plan for invading the DPRK, is watching for every chance to put the plan into practice after bringing massive military hardware to south Korea and areas around it. This makes the situation on the Korean Peninsula unpredictable.
					
					 As in the past the basic factor that threatens peace on the Korean Peninsula is big joint military exercises against the DPRK which the U.S. stage every year.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in its frequent military exercises on the peninsula is to bring down the DPRK by force.
					
					 Even an accidental factor may lead to a war on the peninsula as it is a potential hotbed of the world's biggest thermo-nuclear war. To hold war exercises in such a place is like walking on a sharp edge. It is clear even to a mere child that this is a major cause hobbling the efforts for creating peaceful environment on the peninsula.
					
					 War in Korea will not be beneficial to the world peace and security. The military exercises being staged by the U.S. in the region which has turned into a theatre of fierce scramble for strategic security are beclouding the prospect for peace.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lashes Out at US-S. Korea River-crossing Drill
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lashes Out at US-S. Korea River-crossing Drill
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet army recently staged a joint river-crossing military drill in the area of the Rimjin River, Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province of south Korea.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The drill was waged in the biggest hotspot which proves that it is a grave military provocation and war racket against the DPRK, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The U.S. persistently escalates tensions on the Korean Peninsula and whips up the atmosphere of military confrontation with the DPRK with an aim to secure a justification for keeping its forces and carrying out its policy of military supremacy in the region under the pretext of "deterring military provocation" from the DPRK.
					
					 It is the gangster-like intention of the U.S. to label the DPRK as a "provocateur" and put the region under its permanent occupation and thus lord it over there.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. threatening the security of the DPRK with such saber-rattling, pushing the situation to the extremity.

articles.title: Joint Declarations Are Key to Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Joint Declarations Are Key to Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a key to solving the issue of the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The said declarations are the reunification programmes common to the nation which were adopted at north-south summits and made public at home and abroad soon afterwards. 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration set forth the idea of "By our nation itself", the idea of national independence and unity, an absolute truth in independently carving out the destiny of the nation. 
					
					 The declarations are a culmination of the past north-south agreements. Therefore, they hold an absolute position as the best guidelines in solving the issue of the country's reunification.
					
					 Nothing can replace the north-south declarations in improving the inter-Korean relations and realizing the vital demands and interests of all the Koreans in independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The declarations reflect the interests of the north and the south and the will and demands common to the nation.
					
					 They also provide the way of smartly solving the issue of the inter-Korean relations which have gone into a tailspin.
					
					 The only way of mending the inter-Korean ties is to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the detente and the improved inter-Korean relations, they should opt to respect and implement the declarations, not clinging to the racket of confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces, while vociferating about "provocation".
					
					 Only when all the political parties, organizations and a broad spectrum of compatriots in the north and the south and abroad pool their efforts, wisdom and enthusiasm in preserving and implementing the declarations, the inter-Korean relations will improve in conformity with the compatriots' will and aspirations and the national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification be accelerated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Koreas' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Koreas' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The kidnapping of youngsters of the DPRK by the south Korean authorities is a serious human rights abuse that can never be pardoned. It is a product of a smear campaign aimed to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK by building public opinion over the non-existent "human rights issue in the north".
					 A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun says this Saturday.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are vocal about "human rights abuses" and calling for "bringing an action", reminding one of a thief crying "stop the thief", the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Not a few of those youngsters of the DPRK who were taken back home had their ears torn and bruises all over their bodies as they were beaten with iron stick. They are not normal in their mental and physical conditions as they had long been secluded from the outside world. This is a clear proof of the human rights abuses committed by the south Korean flesh traffickers. It is quite natural that the government of the country which spotted the criminal act branded those concerned with the case as human traffickers and denounced south Korea for its act of alluring and abducting youngsters.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the south Korean anti-DPRK tricksters cover up their inhumane crimes that were recently disclosed.
					
					 The south Korean authorities committed human rights abuses and are working hard to enact a "law on human rights in north Korea" while taking issue with the DPRK. This will only disclose the truth about their "human rights" campaign against the DPRK and their true colors as the chieftain of abduction.
					
					 Anti-DPRK forces should clearly understand that their smear campaign to do harm to the DPRK will bring them international shame and invite curses and censures from the world people.

articles.title: Measles Spread in South Kyongsang Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Measles Spread in South Kyongsang Province, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Measles spread in South Kyongsang Province, south Korea, according to south Korean KBS on Thursday.
					 Ten students of a high school in Changwon, South Kyongsang Province were infected with measles in the middle of April. The number of these cases in the area is close to 30 as of June 3.

articles.title: Punishment of Chun Doo Hwan Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Chun Doo Hwan Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on June 4 carried an article calling for instituting a law on punishing unprecedented murderer Chun Doo Hwan who accumulated illegal funds.
					 The article said there is cropping up again the issue of collecting additional imposition from military dictator Chun Doo Hwan following the disclosure of the fact that his first son operated a bogus company for six years after establishing it abroad.
					
					 The move of instituting legal and institutional mechanism for legitimatizing the collection of additional imposition has become more pronounced, it noted.
					
					 This will help prevent the former and incumbent highest-level government employees from accumulating wealth in an illegal way, by evading additional imposition and Chun Doo Hwan can also be made to pay additional imposition.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" should punish Chun and his family for engaging themselves in irregularities and corruption, the article said, warning it will be branded as the descendants of the "Fifth Republic" if it refuses to punish them.
					
					 To institute the law on collecting additional imposition from Chun brooks no further delay, it added.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on June 5 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Pak Hae Jon, permanent representative of the organization, addressed the meeting.
					
					 13 years after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration which reflects the desire of all fellow countrymen for reunification teach the truth that to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by following through on the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the hope of the nation and a way out, and that if one stands against them, one will face ruin, he said.
					
					 He denounced the "government" for rejecting the proposal of the north on holding joint national events marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 After the present regime emerged in south Korea, the people began to feel the fear of a nuclear war and were thrown into despair with the shuttered Kaesong Industrial Zone, he said, adding this signals more deteriorated plight the regime will face at the end of its tenure than that of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 He urged the present regime not to follow in the footsteps of the Lee regime but make a fundamental switchover in its policy to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and overcome the difficulties lying between the south and the north.
					
					 He called upon the political parties and civic and public organizations in south Korea to preserve and implement the joint declarations and thus put an end to the history of division and achieve national independence, reunification, peace and prosperity on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Concealing Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Concealing Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a commentary on June 3 denouncing the puppet authorities for trying to conceal the crimes.
					 The prosecution decided to issue a warrant of arrest against Won Se Hun, former director of the Intelligence Service (IS), but it was delayed by the minister of Justice, the commentary charged.
					
					 This revealed the authorities' hindrance to investigation aimed to block ties with the IS which was involved in the "presidential election" and conceal the crimes, it held.
					
					 It has been well known to the people that the IS was involved in the illegal election, it said.
					
					 It urged the "government" not to interrupt the probe into the truth about the criminal acts of the IS.

articles.title: Vital Rights of Workers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Vital Rights of Workers Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged actions outside the puppet government central building and the building of the "Saenuri Party" and in other places on June 4 and 5 in demand of the guarantee of the vital rights of the workers.
					 At a meeting in Youido, Seoul on June 5 speakers accused the present chief executive of not taking any measure for settling the issue of Ssangyong Motors though 100 days have passed since she took office after making an election commitment to making a state investigation into the issue.
					
					 They recalled that there go on actions of workers against lay-off and for the abolition of part-time jobs including sit-strikes on iron pylons that have been under way for more than 230 consecutive days before the Ulsan Factory of Hyundai Motors.
					
					 During the Lee Myung Bak regime, workers were beaten and driven out to streets and nothing has changed even under the present regime, they charged.
					
					 Just are the demands of the people for abolishing the part-time jobs and lay-off, they declared, urging the authorities to lift discriminations in society and enforce a fair distribution.
					
					 They called for dynamic actions to abolish part-time jobs, win basic labor right and check the privatization of the public sector.

articles.title: Successful Joint National Events Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Successful Joint National Events Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a candlelight rally in Chonggye Square, Seoul on June 5 demanding the puppet authorities approve the joint national events marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and normalize the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					 Speeches were made at the rally.
					
					 Yun Hui Suk, representative of the Youth Solidarity, recalled that the north proposed joint national events marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Yun accused the Ministry of Unification of refusing a golden opportunity of settling the crisis in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and restoring the relations between the south and the north.
					
					 Ri Chang Bok, permanent chairman of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, said the declaration contains not only humanitarian issue, reunion of separated families and their relatives and economic cooperation but the spirit of independence and reunification.
					
					 Pak Tok Sin, permanent representative of the Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, noted that the south-north relations which had been worsened during the Lee Myung Bak regime were pushed to the lowest ebb due to the crisis of the Kaesong Industrial Zone after the emergence of the present regime.
					
					 He urged the regime to sincerely opt for holding the joint national events and contribute to improving the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Germany and opening ceremonies of Korean photo exhibitions in Nigeria and South Africa on May 30 and June 3. They are to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the exhibitions were photos documenting undying feats of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on show were pictures introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's theory of party-building and exploits of party-leading serve as a real textbook as good as guidelines of struggle of all people, the acting chairman of the Communist Party of Germany and other speakers said, expressing their resolves to make positive efforts to send solidarity to the Korean people's just cause.
					
					 The director and the deputy director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il for achieving the outstanding feats in the party-building and activities by leading the Workers' Party of Korea for half a century.
					
					 They reaffirmed that the WPK will always emerge victorious thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Germany.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Benin
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Benin
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin was inaugurated in Cotonou on June 3 to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize various political and cultural events to widely introduce the exploits of the great men of Mt. Paektu on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Great Men of Mt. Paektu Praised by Beninese Figures
articles.content:
Great Men of Mt. Paektu Praised by Beninese Figures
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Personages of the Socialist Party of Benin praised the undying feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					 Prosperity is in store for the Korean people, who have become dignified and honorable thanks to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, who brought about a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 President of the Socialist Party of Benin Ali Houdu said this at an inaugural ceremony of the party's preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the war.
					
					 Kim Il Sung defeated U.S. imperialism which boasted of the numerical and technical superiority by means of superiority in politics, ideology, strategy and tactics, enjoying boundless admiration and trust of mankind as an iron-willed commander and outstanding military strategist.
					
					 The vice-president of the above-said party said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in Korea's history spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 His leadership is being successfully carried forward by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The history of the victorious war will last forever in the DPRK as it is led by him.

articles.title: WPK's Strategic Line Supported by Political Party of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
WPK's Strategic Line Supported by Political Party of Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, released a statement on May 31 supporting the line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					 It was exciting to hear the news of the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK, he noted, adding:
					
					 The invincible WPK, the heroic Korean People's Army and the Korean people single-mindedly united around their leader overcame all hardships and difficulties and again became honorable victors in the showdown with U.S. imperialism amid biggest tension and serious concern.
					
					 We fully support the conclusion made by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, at the plenary meeting.
					
					 Clear is that the historic declaration on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force will deal a tremendous strike at the hegemonic policy of U.S. imperialism.
					
					 The flame of revolution will bring happiness and prosperity to the Korean people.
					
					 I wish the WPK and the Korean people bigger success in the effort for building an economic power and defending sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Alimentos Basicos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Alimentos Basicos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Alimentos Basicos de Pyongyang.
					Luego de ver el monumento a la direccion en el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal disfruto el panorama de la fabrica y recorrio el salon de presentacion del historial.
					
					Tras ver el video alusivo al proceso de reconstruccion y modernizacion de la fabrica, dijo que esta hace comparar el pasado con el presente e imaginar el futuro y tiene materializada la linea de Tres Revoluciones: ideologia, tecnica y cultura.
					
					Estuvo primero en la guarderia.
					
					Pasando revista a diversos equipos de juego, el cesped extendido en el patio, la sala bien soleada, la cocina, el comedor, la sala de juego intelectual, el cuarto de lactancia, la sala de educacion, etc., evaluo que esos establecimientos fueron acondicionados bien conforme a los requisitos de crianza y al estado psiquico de los infantes.
					
					Despues de ver como operan la casa cultural de la fabrica, recorrio varios procesos de produccion cerciorandose del estado de reconstruccion y modernizacion.
					
					En la sala de mando general, se puso muy contento de que hayan sido computarizados en alto nivel los procesos productivos y las actividades empresariales.
					
					Pasando por los procesos de produccion de aceite refinado, polvo aperitivo, sal refinado, vitamina E y embalaje, nuevamente acondicionados, averiguo las especificaciones y la capacidad de los equipos.
					
					Mirando diversos articulos que salen de las cadenas de produccion acondicionadas con tecnologias sofisticadas, destaco que fueron automatizados en alto nivel los procesos productivos en general.
					
					Sobre todo, elogio la modernizacion del proceso de produccion y el de embalaje, hecha en cooperacion con la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y otras casas de altos estudios.
					
					Lo importante de la renovacion tecnologica es acelerar la modernizacion con fuerzas y tecnologias propias, senalo y agrego que hay que incentivar la innovacion y la creatividad de cientificos, tecnicos y obreros y elevar el porcentaje de uso de equipos de fabricacion nacional.
					
					Vio la salsa y pasta de soya, polvo aperitivo, aceite, vitamina E, lecitina y otros productos de la fabrica.
					
					En la biblioteca electronica y la de libros cientifico-tecnicos, averiguo como se divulgan las tecnologias avanzadas. 
					
					Recorriendo el bano, la piscina, la peluqueria, la barberia, la sala de musica y otro, evaluo la construccion magnifica de las instalaciones de servicios publicos.
					
					Dijo que todas las unidades deben aprender el ejemplo de esta fabrica, subrayando que ella es un palacio para los obreros con aspectos de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo donde se desborda el patriotismo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los empleados de la fabrica cumpliran exitosamente con su honrosa mision y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Paek Kye Ryong, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song y Jon Chang Bok.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de Elizabeth II
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de Elizabeth II
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion a la monarca del Reino Unido de Gran Bretana e Irlanda del Norte, Elizabeth II, con motivo de su cumpleanos oficial, Dia Nacional del pais europeo.
					 Kim mando saludo de felicitacion a la reina deseando prosperidad al pueblo britanico.

articles.title: Celebran cumpleanos de delegados al VII Congreso de ONC
articles.content:
Celebran cumpleanos de delegados al VII Congreso de ONC
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Restaurante Chongryu el acto de felicitacion de cumpleanos de los delegados al VII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios correspondientes y los delegados que acogen sus cumpleanos durante el congreso.
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un dispenso la benevolencia de preparar la mesa de cumpleanos para los delegados al VII Congreso de la ONC. Continuo que este encuentro refleja el amor profundo y calido del Mariscal quien desea la felicidad eterna de las nuevas generaciones.
					
					Apunto que en acato al noble proposito del Mariscal, los delegados deben formarse como personal competente de la revolucion con ricos conocimientos, buenas virtudes y excelente constitucion fisica y como pilares de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los participantes manifestaron la decision de estudiar y participar mejor en la vida organizativa bajo la consigna de "!Preparemonos siempre para el estimado General Kim Jong Un!" y ser vanguardias y revolucionarios infantiles que apoyen con fidelidad al Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por preservar la paz en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por preservar la paz en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual del dia 8, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que si Estados Unidos desea de todo corazon la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, debe cancelar su politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y todos los planes de ejercicios militares.
					Todavia en esta peninsula no se han dado las condiciones de paz duradera, asi comienza el rotativo y prosigue:
					
					Mientras que no se cambie la politica hostil sobre la RPDC de EE.UU., en la Peninsula Coreana persiste la posibilidad de estallido de guerra. Para colmo, EE.UU., que ha introducido muchos equipos militares en el Sur de Corea y su contorno, tiene el plan de agredir militarmente a la RPDC y espera la oportunidad de materializarlo, hecho que hace imposible prever la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, el factor principal que amenaza la paz de la Peninsula Coreana es ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura que libra cada ano EE.UU. para atropellar a la RPDC por via militar.
					
					Sobra la posibilidad de que por un incidente cualquiera, estalle la guerra en la peninsula que puede convertirse en el foco de guerra termonuclear mas grande del mundo.
					
					Las detonaciones en la Peninsula Coreana no convendran tampoco a la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					En esta region, donde se libra una aguda pelea multilateral en aras de la seguridad estrategica, los ejercicios militares de EE.UU. entenebrecen cada vez mas las perspectivas de paz.
